action.description:
Introduced by Senators L. Johnson, Dassler-Alfheim, Hesselbein, Keyeski, Larson, Ratcliff, Roys, Smith and Spreitzer; 
cosponsored by Representatives Stroud, Andraca, Arney, Bare, Clancy, Fitzgerald, Goodwin, Haywood, Hysell, Joers, Madison, Mayadev, Miresse, Neubauer, Palmeri, Phelps, Prado, Rivera-Wagner, Roe, Sinicki, Snodgrass, Subeck, Taylor, Tenorio, Udell, Stubbs and Johnson
